snippet.title: Neon Sword Teaser #1 [outdated visually]
snippet.description:
"Neon Sword" is a 3D open-world RPG set in a city bathed in neon
80s inspired cyberpunk.

Developer: Pea Head Games

IndieDB:    http://www.indiedb.com/games/neon-sword
Twitter:      https://twitter.com/peaheadgames
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/Peaheadgames
Website:    http://neonsword.peaheadgames.com/
